title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 - Brest, Belarus
description:
November, 14 is the day when any engineer can get away from the pressure of “getting things done” and retreat to the software craftsmanship harbor. This year 20+ EPAM offices are officially joining the Global Day of Coderetreat and we are inviting you to master your coding skills together with other EPAMers. 
Register Me! (https://events.epam.com/events/coderetreat-brest)
